task.title: Internship Resources
task.shortdesc: Internships are one of many ways to get experience during college, and there are many locations to find internships. While some outlets can be found through Virgina Tech, there are also many other locations that offer internship opportunites. There are many types of intership experiences, including field study, part-time, volunteering, shadowing and much more.

taskbody.context:
This page provides some of the best outlets to find internships, whether it be through Virginia Tech, or an outside source.
Through Virginia Tech

step.cmd: Hokies4Hire: ()This link takes you to the log in page for Hokies4Hire, once logged in you can navigate job opportunities, career events, modify your profile and much more.
Career Fairs:()Here is a link to the Virgina Tech career fair/job fair page, here you can find information on department specific career fairs, including dates, locations and more.

Career Shift:()Career shift is a free outlet for Virginia Tech students to marekt themselves to millions of jobs. This site provides in-depth acess to company information as well as unlimited resume and cover letter templates to work with.
GoinGlobal:()This Link will take you to the Virginia Tech login page for GoinGlobal, input your VT PID and password to gain access to career guides, jobs, interships and more.
